Organizing Committee for People's Welfare formed in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) --The people's solidarity for health and welfare of the (South) Korean confederation of trade unions and 20 other citizens and public organizations in South Korea called a press conference in Seoul on October 11 and inaugurated an organizing committee for a "solidarity meeting for people's welfare, the right to labor and vital rights" to urge the authorities to take a welfare measure, according to Yonhap News from Seoul. 
 The organizations declared that they would file a complaint against the biased "public welfare system" of the authorities including the deplorable condition of the irregular workers and propose measures to cope with them.
